overview: Spanish teacher Angelica struggles to adapt to the routine imposed by the Covid-19 pandemic. During the interval between classes, a set of concerns is revealed: adequacy of classes to the virtual environment, insecurity about staying in the job, the current political scenario, in addition to the pressures related to their physical and mental well-being. Over five dense minutes, accompanying the teacher, it is possible to see her interacting with friends on social networks, in order to be distracted, before starting the new class. But not all nights are being equal...
title: A trégua
